title: Mirkic7
author: Mirkic7
created_time: August 22, 2023, 11:06:04 AMLast edit: November 07, 2023, 10:26:09 AM by Mirkic7
content: List of threads:Announce | Bounty Program | About usTwitter - 40.00% - 60 000$Telegram - 40.00% - 60 000$Discord - 20.00% - 30 000$Eons - This exclusive poral contains NFTs of varying rarity levels. Each NFT is valued up to $1000!FAQs and other discussions can be made in Eontribe Bounty150 000$ is allocated for this Bounty campaignThe bounty program is launched on 22/08/2023 and will run until 31/10/2023„Ö§Disclaimer: By agreeing to participate in this bounty, you acknowledge that the wallet address and the email address you submitted are final and can't be changed, bounty manager reserves the right to make changes to the conditions at any time.We are responsible only for managing the campaign. Participating in or investing in this bounty campaign will be at your own risk.All participants must join the Eontribe's official Twitter, Telegram, DiscordAll participants must join hereOnly messages in the English language are permitted.The rewards will be distributed in the end of the bounty campaignUsing multiple accounts, cheating, and spamming are not allowed.Users with negative reputations are not eligible to participate in our bounty campaign.Impersonating others or using someone else's information in your reports will result in permanent banning.All participants must send the Proof of Authentication post and register on the form to join the bounty program.If you have not registered on the form, your answer will not be countedIf you send your report of previous week after the deadline, you will not receive your rewards.Example:Code:#Proof of authenticationJoined: *campaign name*Bitcointalk Username:Bitcointalk Profile Link:Telegram Username:Wallet address: Submit Your Weekly Report On This Thread.Week 1 (22/08 - 28/08)Week 2 (29/08 - 04/09)Week 3 (05/09 - 11/09)Week 4 (12/09 - 18/09)Week 5 (19/09 - 25/09)Week 6 (26/09 - 02/10)Week 7 (03/10 - 09/10)Week 8 (10/10 - 16/10)Week 9 (17/10 - 23/10)Week 10 (24/10 - 31/10) The complaint or other problems by complaint form is below.Complaint FormComplaint SpreadsheetFinal SpreadsheetNote: Complaints will be checked every week.General SpreadsheetHave more than 50 followers: 1 eon/weekHave more than 300 followers: 2 eons/weekHave more than 500 followers: 3 eons/weekHave more than 1,000 followers: 5 eons/weekHave more than 5,000 followers: 35 eons/weekHave more than 10,000 followers: 75 eons/weekEvery participant must follow Eontribe's TwitterTwitter accounts must have a minimum of 50 followers.Invite friends to follow Eontribe official Twitter Make at least 5 tweets/retweets per week.Participants must use #eontribe #eontribeapp #NFT #NFTs #Cryptocurrency #Crypto hashtags and tag @eontribe in their post.Join Eontribe's official Telegram ChatJoin Eontribe‚Äôs official Telegram ChannelFollow Eontribe TwitterAll participants must join hereFill out the registration form and send the Proof of Authentication post.Submit your weekly reports here and in reply under this post during If you send your report of previous week after the deadline, you will not receive your rewards.Code:#Proof of authenticationWeek 1 (xx-xx)Bitcointalk Username:Twitter Profile link:Retweet Links:1.2.3. ¬† ¬† 5 Eons per weekUpdate your Telegram name to "Your Name | Eontribe''.Write (proof spreadsheet) at least 5 constructive messages weekly in other crypto-related and NFT-related telegram groups with a minimum of 1k members. Posts/messages must be constructive, useful, and in a way that will not be considered spam.Write at least 5 constructive messages weekly in Eontribe official Telegram Chat. Posts/messages must be constructive, useful, and in a way that will not be considered spam.Deleted messages will not be counted.Report your telegram message links weekly.You must use a Telegram nickname until the end of the campaign (week).Join Eontribe's official Telegram ChatJoin Eontribe‚Äôs official Telegram ChannelAll participants must join hereFill out the registration form and send the Proof of Authentication post.Submit your weekly reports here and in reply under this postIf you send your report of previous week after the deadline, you will not receive your rewards.Code:#Proof of authenticationWeek 1 (xx-xx)Bitcointalk Username:Telegram Profile link:Messages Links:1.2.3. ¬† ¬† 5 Eons per weekUpdate your Telegram name to "Your Name | Eontribe''.Write (proof spreadsheet) at least 5 constructive messages weekly in other crypto-related and NFT-related telegram groups with a minimum of 1k members. Posts/messages must be constructive, useful, and in a way that will not be considered spam.Write at least 5 constructive messages weekly on Eontribe Discord server.Deleted messages will not be counted.Report your discord message links weekly.You must wear a Discord nickname until the end of the campaign (week).Join Eontribe's official Telegram ChatJoin Eontribe‚Äôs official Telegram Channel Join Eontribe‚Äôs official Discord.All participants must join hereFill out the registration form and send the Proof of Authentication post.Submit your weekly reports here and in reply under this postIf you send your report of previous week after the deadline, you will not receive your rewards.Code:#Proof of authenticationWeek 1 (xx-xx)Bitcointalk Username:Discord Profile link:Messages Links:1.2.3. ¬† ¬† 5 Eons per weekWrite (proof spreadsheet) at least 10 constructive messages weekly in Eontribe official Chat. Posts/messages must be constructive, useful, and in a way that will not be considered spam.Deleted messages will not be counted.Report your telegram message links weekly.Join Eontribe's official Telegram ChatJoin Eontribe‚Äôs official Telegram ChannelAll participants must join hereFill out the  registration form and send the Proof of Authentication post.Submit your weekly reports here and in reply under this postIf you send your report of previous week after the deadline, you will not receive your rewards.Code:#Proof of authenticationBitcointalk Username:Telegram Profile link:Messages Links:1.2.3.
